channel.title: Jamie Archers - Website on Hugo Starter Site
channel.description: Recent content in Jamie Archers - Website on Hugo Starter Site

item.title: Colophon
item.author: judah@joodaloop.com (Judah)
item.description: Hosted on Github, published with Netlify (free tier).

item.title: How to refresh browser cache
item.author: judah@joodaloop.com (Judah)
item.description: Sometimes you need to clear the google cache: Press ctrl+F5

item.title: How to update the site from git
item.author: judah@joodaloop.com (Judah)

item.title: My first Post
item.author: judah@joodaloop.com (Judah)
item.description: Why bother ? Inspired to come back to the internet and try a static website one last time. An attempt to write things down. Perhaps a journal, a blog. Perhaps musings on the future. Interests in many things, fiction, engineering, computing, science, history and art.

item.title: Notebooks on the internet
item.author: judah@joodaloop.com (Judah)
item.description: It might be useful to keep notebook on the internet.
